title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the types of competitor data to be collected (e.g., pricing, product features, market share, customer reviews, social media mentions), the analysis methods to be used (sentiment analysis, trend analysis, competitive benchmarking, predictive modeling), the desired output formats for strategic insights (reports, dashboards, alerts, data visualizations), and any specific performance, scalability, or security requirements. Clearly outline the expected user roles, permissions, and access levels within the system, with a focus on differentiating between admin, analyst, and viewer roles. Additionally, specify any additional APIs or third-party services that may be required, along with their functionalities, and consider potential integration with CRM/ERP systems if applicable. Provide examples of specific use cases to demonstrate the tool's effectiveness. In addition, establish a process for updating the system as new competitors emerge and market conditions change, with an emphasis on automating this process where possible. Furthermore, outline any potential data privacy concerns and strategies for addressing them. In case of integration with CRM/ERP systems, specify how user authentication and authorization will be managed. If applicable, provide guidelines for customizing the tool to meet specific industry or company needs. In the revised RFC, include a section discussing the overall timeline and milestones for the project's completion. Lastly, update the task status as 'REVIEW_REQUIRED' since this RFC requires code-architect review before proceeding.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data collection, processing, analysis, and reporting components, as well as the integration points and data flows.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Establish the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and any necessary development tools or frameworks.

title: Implement Data Collection Component
description: Develop the component responsible for gathering competitor data from various sources, such as websites, social media, news articles, and industry reports.

title: Implement Data Processing and Analysis Component
description: Develop the component responsible for processing and analyzing the collected data using AI and machine learning techniques to extract meaningful insights.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for presenting the strategic insights and allowing users to interact with the system, such as configuring data sources, analysis parameters, and report formats.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Implement the necessary data storage and management solutions for storing and managing the collected data, analysis results, and user configurations.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Implement appropriate security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and protect the system from unauthorized access or misuse.

title: Create Test Plans and Test Cases
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases to ensure the quality and reliability of the system, covering functional, integration, and performance testing.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Execute the test plans and test cases, identify and resolve any issues or defects, and ensure the system meets the defined quality standards.
dependencies: Create Test Plans and Test Cases

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides to assist users in understanding and effectively utilizing the system's features and capabilities.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Deploy the system to the production environment, set up monitoring and logging mechanisms, and establish processes for ongoing maintenance and support.
dependencies: Implement Data Processing and Analysis Component
Set up Data Storage and Management
Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
